steps.title: Draw a large circle near the topmost center area of the paper.
steps.content: Draw a large circle near the topmost center area of the paper.

steps.title: Below the circle, draw a large horizontal oval with one side slightly diagonal towards the head.
steps.content: Below the circle, draw a large horizontal oval with one side slightly diagonal towards the head. Intersect the higher area of the oval with the circle.

steps.title: Draw a pair of stretched, little, vertical ovals at the base of the bigger oval.
steps.content: Draw a pair of stretched, little, vertical ovals at the base of the bigger oval. Intersect each to the bigger oval to serve as its legs.

steps.title: On the head part, draw facial guide lines (a vertical line at the center with three horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of three-beamed cross).
steps.content: On the head part, draw facial guide lines (a vertical line at the center with three horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of three-beamed cross). This will help in placing the Yorkie's eyes, nose and mouth. Draw a pair of little circles where the Yorkie's ears should be.

steps.title: Using the facial line guides, start drawing the Yorkie's eyes and nose.
steps.content: Using the facial line guides, start drawing the Yorkie's eyes and nose. Put sequence of dashes to give it a furry complexion.

steps.title: Continue tracing the outline of the Yorkie's head, using zigzag lines and dashes.
steps.content: Continue tracing the outline of the Yorkie's head, using zigzag lines and dashes.

steps.title: Complete the tracing of the Yorkie's head and ears (again, using little zigzag lines and dashes for furry complexion).
steps.content: Complete the tracing of the Yorkie's head and ears (again, using little zigzag lines and dashes for furry complexion).

steps.title: Start drawing the Yorkie's furry legs.
steps.content: Start drawing the Yorkie's furry legs.

steps.title: Trace the Yorkie's hind legs, "chest" furs and its neck part.
steps.content: Trace the Yorkie's hind legs, "chest" furs and its neck part.

steps.title: Complete the tracing of the Yorkie's furry body.
steps.content: Complete the tracing of the Yorkie's furry body.

steps.title: Remove unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Near the top and leftmost side of the paper, draw a large circle for the Yorkie's head.
steps.content: Near the top and leftmost side of the paper, draw a large circle for the Yorkie's head.

steps.title: Below and intersecting the circle, draw a large egg-shaped oval (horizontal orientation, with the most slim part pointed away from the circle).
steps.content: Below and intersecting the circle, draw a large egg-shaped oval (horizontal orientation, with the most slim part pointed away from the circle).

steps.title: Draw a pair of stretched, little, vertical ovals at the base of the bigger oval.
steps.content: Draw a pair of stretched, little, vertical ovals at the base of the bigger oval. Intersect each to the bigger oval to serve as its front legs (so be sure to align it with the head).

steps.title: Draw another pair of ovals at the other side of (but still below) the large oval.
steps.content: Draw another pair of ovals at the other side of (but still below) the large oval. This will be the hind legs.

steps.title: On the head part, draw facial guide lines (a vertical line placed at the center with three horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of three-beamed cross).
steps.content: On the head part, draw facial guide lines (a vertical line placed at the center with three horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of three-beamed cross). This will help in placing the Yorkie's eyes, nose and mouth.

steps.title: Draw a pair of little circles where the Yorkie's ears should be.
steps.content: Draw a pair of little circles where the Yorkie's ears should be.

steps.title: Using the facial guide lines, draw the Yorkie's eyes.
steps.content: Using the facial guide lines, draw the Yorkie's eyes.

steps.title: Still using the facial guide lines, draw its nose and mouth (with its tongue panting out).
steps.content: Still using the facial guide lines, draw its nose and mouth (with its tongue panting out).

steps.title: Tracing the Yorkie's head with zigzag lines to give it a furry complexion.
steps.content: Tracing the Yorkie's head with zigzag lines to give it a furry complexion. Do also a pair of zigzag lines below the eyes and surrounding its snout.

steps.title: Continue tracing the upper part of the Yorkie's head with curvy zigzag lines.
steps.content: Continue tracing the upper part of the Yorkie's head with curvy zigzag lines. Do another pair of zigzag lines above its eyes.
